Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_file_seek_callback

The function AIL_file_seek_callback specifies user replaceable callback to seek in a file.

S32 AILCALLBACK AIL_file_seek_callback(
  U32 file_handle,
  S32 offset,
  U32 type
);

In Parameters

file_handle
specifies the file handle to seek within.
offset
specifies the offset to seek to.
type
will be set to a MILES_FILE_SEEK_TYPE constant.

Returns

This function should return the new absolute position of the file pointer (relative to the beginning of the file).


Group: Memory and File Services
Related Functions: AIL_file_close_callback, AIL_file_open_callback, AIL_file_read_callback, AIL_set_file_callbacks
Related Basic Types: MILES_FILE_SEEK_TYPE, S32, U32
